items.name: Aegis Aurora
explicitMods: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
12% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flavourText: Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Cold, Travel, Blink, AoE

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving Chilled ground in an area at both ends of the teleport. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods:
19% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Normal or Magic Enemy in Area
99% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Rare or Unique Enemy in Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: When Dual Wielding, Deals 75% Damage from each Weapon combined
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.

items.name: Quill Rain
flavourText: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.

You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.90 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

it was his leadership that earned Aul, the Last King, his crown.
